skills.name: Email Writer
skills.description: Draft 1 email, a campaign, or a nurture sequence using a high converting marketing framework. Includes lead magnet delivery, nurture sequences, and monthly offer campaigns.
skills.shortDescription: Write professional emails with the perfect tone
skills.author: Technical Leaders

skills.name: LinkedIn Profile Optimizer
skills.description: Transform LinkedIn profiles from generic CV-style listings into conversion-focused funnels that attract ideal opportunities. Includes headline formulas, PASTOR framework for About sections, and banner strategies.
skills.shortDescription: Optimize your LinkedIn profile for lead generation
skills.author: Technical Leaders

skills.name: LinkedIn Prospect Builder
skills.description: Build a prospect list from ICP files using LinkedIn and Sales Navigator. Executes searches, extracts profiles, and compiles results into a structured spreadsheet with clickable LinkedIn profile URLs.
skills.shortDescription: Build prospect lists from LinkedIn search
skills.author: Technical Leaders

skills.name: LinkedIn Connect
skills.description: Automate sending LinkedIn connection requests from a prospects spreadsheet. Sends personalized notes within LinkedIn's 300 character limit.
skills.shortDescription: Send connection requests from prospect lists
skills.author: Technical Leaders

skills.name: LinkedIn Converse
skills.description: Start conversations with new LinkedIn connections that match your ICP. Identifies high-value connections and sends casual, non-salesy conversation starters.
skills.author: Technical Leaders

skills.name: ICP Cloner
skills.description: Clone an Ideal Client Profile from a LinkedIn PDF export. Creates an ICP document with search parameters for both LinkedIn Basic Search and Sales Navigator to find similar people.
skills.shortDescription: Create ICP from LinkedIn profile export
skills.author: Technical Leaders

skills.name: DM Trust Coach
skills.description: Real-time DM sales coaching using Trust Physics. Reads buyer psychology, detects emotional posture, calculates Trust Utility, and suggests trust-building moves through the G1-G6 gate progression.
skills.shortDescription: Get coached on trust-building DM conversations
skills.author: Technical Leaders

skills.name: Prospect Workflow
skills.description: Unified ICP-to-outreach workflow with three commands: find icp (build prospect lists), start conversations (prioritize and craft openers), and create content (generate ICP-targeted posts).
skills.author: Technical Leaders

skills.name: Get Paid Connections
skills.description: Process LinkedIn connection requests from Slack notifications about the 2026 Fortune 100 Prompt Library. Monitors Slack, processes unhandled leads, and sends LinkedIn connection requests.
skills.author: Technical Leaders

skills.name: Content Creator
skills.description: Advanced content creation system using the Lego Framework to generate high-converting posts. Uses 4 building blocks (Hook, Stack, Payoff, Invitation) and 6 content angles.
skills.shortDescription: Create content using the Lego Framework
skills.author: Technical Leaders

skills.name: Content Marketer
skills.description: Write blog posts, social media content, and email newsletters. Optimizes for SEO and creates content calendars with keyword optimization.
skills.author: Technical Leaders

skills.name: Case Study Landing Page
skills.description: Transform transcripts, notes, or raw content into high-conversion case study landing pages. Uses the Frustration → Fix → Future narrative framework with production-ready HTML output.
skills.shortDescription: Create case study landing pages from content
skills.author: Technical Leaders

skills.name: Update Positioning
skills.description: Interpret recent marketing data for positioning insights and optimize LinkedIn profile based on findings. Connects PostHog, Kit, and LinkedIn analytics to profile improvements.
skills.author: Technical Leaders

skills.name: PostHog Conversion Insights
skills.description: Analyze PostHog data to generate strategic and tactical insights for improving conversion rates. Covers signups, call bookings, and Stripe purchases with funnel diagnostics.
skills.author: Technical Leaders

skills.name: Kit Funnel Analytics
skills.description: Marketing funnel and conversion analysis using Kit (ConvertKit) MCP server. Identifies hot leads, analyzes email performance, lead scoring, and subscriber segmentation.
skills.author: Technical Leaders

skills.name: Business Book Writer
skills.description: Write a high-impact business book (100 pages max) with world-class editor guidance. Combines extreme practical value of Traction, visual style of $100M Offers, and universal appeal of How to Win Friends.
skills.author: Technical Leaders

skills.name: AcreHedge Weekly Report
skills.description: Create AcreHedge's Weekly Commodity & Risk Management Report for U.S. row crop farmers. Covers corn, soybeans, wheat, rice, crude oil, diesel, and fertilizer prices.
skills.author: Technical Leaders

skills.name: AI Memo
skills.description: Create Tech Leaders' Weekly AI Memo for technical leaders and executives navigating AI transformation. Frames insights through Literacy, Leverage, and Leadership pillars.
skills.author: Technical Leaders

skills.name: Tutorial Engineer
skills.description: Creates step-by-step tutorials and educational content from code. Transforms complex concepts into progressive learning experiences with hands-on examples.
skills.shortDescription: Create tutorials from code and concepts
skills.author: Technical Leaders

skills.name: Fogg Prototype
skills.description: Spec out functional UX features for feedback from your ICP. Uses the BJ Fogg Behavior Model of Motivation, Ability, and Prompt to create user experience flows.
skills.shortDescription: Design UX using Fogg Behavior Model
skills.author: Technical Leaders

skills.name: Wedge Roadmap
skills.description: Create a roadmap of features prioritized by what will be most impactful and monetizable. Uses Jobs To Be Done framework to identify wedge features for go-to-market.
skills.author: Technical Leaders

skills.name: JTBD to Workflow
skills.description: Break down a job-to-be-done into a step-by-step SOP that can be turned into an AI workflow. Identifies which steps need human oversight vs AI automation.
skills.author: Technical Leaders

skills.name: Sea of Demand
skills.description: Find niche communities and pain point language for ICP. Discovers where target audiences gather online and extracts their exact pain points, language, and buying triggers.
skills.shortDescription: Find communities discussing your ICP's problems
skills.author: Technical Leaders
